name: decsuc
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3

stmt.origin: eqtr4i(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdc(c1, c2), co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c1), caddc, c2))

|- wceq(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdc(c1, c2))

comment: The successor of a decimal integer (no carry). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Apr-2015.) (Revised by AV, 6-Sep-2021.)
